skills.desc: Attacks 4 times at random. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Poisonous Spit

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies 3 times. Each hit has a 60% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff on the target for 2 turns. Each hit also has a 60% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff on the target for 2 turns.
skills.name: Slashing Wind

skills.desc: Reflects 15% of the damage taken back to the attacker.
skills.name: Ricochet [Passive]

skills.desc: Immune to [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], [Provoke], [Block Active Skills], [Block Passive Skills], [Fear], and [True Fear] debuffs. Also immune to HP exchange effects, HP balancing effects, and cooldown increasing effects.
skills.name: Almighty Immunity [Passive]
